Estonia: The Livonian Order and Estonians are defeated by Novgorod in the Battle of the Ice.
France: Saintonge War: Henry III of England arrived with an army in support of Isabella's claim to Poitiers.
Latvia: Alexander Nevsky defeated the Livonian Order on Lake Peipus.
Russia: Battle of the Ice: The army of Novgorod defeated the invading Teutonic Knights on the frozen surface of Lake Peipus.
